execution_plan.description: Extract emails with their country and county (treated as state) from the users_db customers table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT email_address AS email, country, county AS state, customer_id AS customer_id, 'users_db' AS source FROM customers WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Extract emails with their country from the sales_eu customers table (no state column available here).
execution_plan.query: SELECT email AS email, country, NULL::text AS state, id AS customer_id, 'sales_eu' AS source FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Extract emails with their country from the sales_us customers table (no state column available here).
execution_plan.query: SELECT email AS email, country, NULL::text AS state, id AS customer_id, 'sales_us' AS source FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
